data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Bin, Wang, Chin-Fah (2018): Henanocerus lineatus gen. nov. and sp. nov., a new leafhopper feeding on Populus tomentosa Carrière from China (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae). Zootaxa 4442 (4): 584-588, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.4.7|1 occurrence
